item.title: The process of 2D Image Formation
item.description: This blog has two parts, Part 1 : Image Projection Part 2 : Image Rendering In the first section we will see that how is an image captured. In second part we will dive into digitalization of an image signal. Part 1 : IMAGE PROJECTION Concept of Pinhole Camera In order to form an image on 2D grid we need the light rays from illumination source to hit the image sensor.

item.title: Contact
item.description: I am always up for healthy discussions, and just a mail away. Please feel free to reach me out. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message
